level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor may issue rules to implement this subchapter, including procedures for additional enforcement actions for violation of this subchapter and the setting of fees in accordance with the provisions of subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-238
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-238, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 44-551.
